about_the_game: Original Soundtrack for Interrogation: You will be deceived, composed by Dexi Antoniu. Each track has been specially crafted to immerse the player in the mistery of a particular investigation while leaving enough room for them to think and focus. This DLC contains all 9 tracks as .mp3 and .flac with a total runtime of about 34 minutes.
